content.rendered:
Offshore Development Center

We can help you save up to 60% of your software development project execution expenses. Get your ideal development team with experienced management to make your project perfect
Reserve a team

IT executives see the talent shortage as the most significant adoption barrier to 64% of emerging technologies, compared with just 4% in 2020, according to a new survey from Gartner, Inc. A lack of talent availability was cited far more often than other barriers this year, such as implementation cost (29%) or security risk (7%).

Gartner

September 2021

IT executives see the talent shortage as the most significant adoption barrier to 64% of emerging technologies, compared with just 4% in 2020, according to a new survey from Gartner, Inc. A lack of talent availability was cited far more often than other barriers this year, such as implementation cost (29%) or security risk (7%).

Gartner

September 2021

Offshore Development
Center

How we perform

Snotor approach

Medium to long-term commitments (1+ year)
Proven governance model
Tailored teams
We invest in infrastructure, hiring and knowledge transfer
We help with with team structuring and planning
We participate in risk sharing
VS.

Traditional approach

No long-term commitment
RFP for every project
Vendors not expected to invest
Vendors follow customer orders thus reducing added value
No long-term commitment
No long-term commitment
